title: Rubber hose/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Rubber_hose "Rubber hose")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| ) [![Rubber hose.png](/images/2/26/Rubber_hose.png)](/wiki/File:Rubber_hose.png) |                                                                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 名称                                                                               | 橡胶管                                                                                          |
| 外观                                                                               | 橡胶管                                                                                          |
| 伤害（小型）                                                                           | 1d4                                                                                          |
| 伤害（大型）                                                                           | 1d3                                                                                          |
| 命中修正                                                                             | +0                                                                                           |
| 武器技能类别                                                                           | [鞭子](/wiki/%E9%9E%AD%E5%AD%90 "鞭子")                                                          |
| 规格                                                                               | [单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)") |
| 基础价                                                                              | 3 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN") （+10/正数附魔等级）                                               |
| 重量                                                                               | [20](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)") |
| 材料                                                                               | [塑料](/index.php?title=%E5%A1%91%E6%96%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "塑料 (page does not exist)") |

**橡胶管**（rubber hose）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种罕见的[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它使用[鞭子](/wiki/%E9%9E%AD%E5%AD%90 "鞭子")[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")，用[塑料](/index.php?title=%E5%A1%91%E6%96%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "塑料 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [4.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [4.4 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [5 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

橡胶管不会随机生成，只会在[吉斯通警察](/index.php?title=%E5%90%89%E6%96%AF%E9%80%9A%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "吉斯通警察 (page does not exist)")的[起始物品](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")里以1⁄6的概率出现[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 策略

橡胶管的伤害比[牛鞭](/wiki/%E7%89%9B%E9%9E%AD "牛鞭")更高，而且对厚皮怪物也能造成伤害。尽管如此，由于缺乏牛鞭的其他功能（如缴械），橡胶管依然是平平无奇的武器。玩家们一般将其当作[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")对象，或者用于其他[垃圾](/index.php?title=%E5%9E%83%E5%9C%BE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "垃圾 (page does not exist)")能派上的用途。

## 历史

橡胶管最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Rubber_hose/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), rubber hoses are removed along with the Keystone Kops, which have been replaced by the [Keter Sephiroth](/wiki/Keter_Sephiroth "Keter Sephiroth").

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a rubber hose can be combined with a [club](/wiki/Club "Club") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a [baseball bat](/wiki/Baseball_bat "Baseball bat").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), all [Drunks](/wiki/Drunk "Drunk") start the game with a +0 rubber hose.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), rubber hoses can be found in junk [shops](/wiki/Shop "Shop").

## 百科文本

吉斯通警察和橡胶管共用同一条[百科](/index.php?title=%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "百科 (page does not exist)")文本：

The Kops are a brilliant concept. To take a gaggle of inept policemen and display them over and over again in a series of riotously funny physical punishments plays equally well to the peanut gallery and the expensive box seats. People hate cops. Even people who have never had anything to do with cops hate them. Of course, we count on them to keep order and to protect us when we need protecting, and we love them on television shows in which they have nerves of steel and hearts of gold, but in the abstract, as a nation, collectively we hate them. They are too much like high school principals. We're very happy to see their pants fall down, and they look good to us with pie on their faces. The Keystone Kops turn up--and they get punished for it, as they crash into each other, fall down, and suffer indignity after indignity. Here is pure movie satisfaction.  
  
The Kops are very skillfully presented. The comic originality and timing in one of their chase scenes requires imagination to think up, talent to execute, understanding of the medium, and, of course, raw courage to perform. The Kops are madmen presented as incompetents, and they're madmen rushing around in modern machines. What's more, the machines they were operating in their routines were newly invented and not yet experienced by the average moviegoer. (In the early days of automobiles, it was reported that there were only two cars registered in all of Kansas City, and they ran into each other. There is both poetry and philosophy in this fact, but most of all, there is humor. Sennett got the humor.)

\[ Silent Stars, by Jeanine Basinger ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 389](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L389)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")

Rubber hose/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Rubber hose
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
)
名称 橡胶管
外观 橡胶管
伤害（小型） 1d4
伤害（大型） 1d3
命中修正 +0
武器技能类别 鞭子
规格 单手
基础价 3 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 20
材料 塑料

橡胶管（rubber hose）是NetHack中的一种罕见的武器。它使用鞭子技能，用塑料制成。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 策略
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 dNetHack
    • 4.2 SpliceHack
    • 4.3 SlashTHEM
    • 4.4 Hack'EM
  • 5 百科文本
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

橡胶管不会随机生成，只会在吉斯通警察的起始物品里以1⁄6的概率出现[1]。

策略

橡胶管的伤害比牛鞭更高，而且对厚皮怪物也能造成伤害。尽管如此，由于缺乏牛鞭的其他功能（如缴械），橡胶管依然是平平无奇的武器。玩家们一般将其当作批量变形对象，或者用于其他垃圾能派上的用途。

历史

橡胶管最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

dNetHack

In dNetHack, rubber hoses are removed along with the Keystone Kops, which have been replaced by the Keter Sephiroth.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a rubber hose can be combined with a club at a furnace to create a baseball bat.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, all Drunks start the game with a +0 rubber hose.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, rubber hoses can be found in junk shops.

百科文本

吉斯通警察和橡胶管共用同一条百科文本：

The Kops are a brilliant concept. To take a gaggle of inept policemen and display them over and over again in a series of riotously funny physical punishments plays equally well to the peanut gallery and the expensive box seats. People hate cops. Even people who have never had anything to do with cops hate them. Of course, we count on them to keep order and to protect us when we need protecting, and we love them on television shows in which they have nerves of steel and hearts of gold, but in the abstract, as a nation, collectively we hate them. They are too much like high school principals. We're very happy to see their pants fall down, and they look good to us with pie on their faces. The Keystone Kops turn up--and they get punished for it, as they crash into each other, fall down, and suffer indignity after indignity. Here is pure movie satisfaction.

The Kops are very skillfully presented. The comic originality and timing in one of their chase scenes requires imagination to think up, talent to execute, understanding of the medium, and, of course, raw courage to perform. The Kops are madmen presented as incompetents, and they're madmen rushing around in modern machines. What's more, the machines they were operating in their routines were newly invented and not yet experienced by the average moviegoer. (In the early days of automobiles, it was reported that there were only two cars registered in all of Kansas City, and they ran into each other. There is both poetry and philosophy in this fact, but most of all, there is humor. Sennett got the humor.)

[ Silent Stars, by Jeanine Basinger ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 389

'''橡胶管'''（rubber hose）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种罕见的[[武器]]。它使用[[鞭子]][[技能]]，用[[塑料]]制成。

== 生成 ==
橡胶管不会随机生成，只会在[[吉斯通警察]]的[[怪物起始物品|起始物品]]里以{{frac|6}}的概率出现{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|389|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
橡胶管的伤害比[[牛鞭]]更高，而且对厚皮怪物也能造成伤害。尽管如此，由于缺乏牛鞭的其他功能（如缴械），橡胶管依然是平平无奇的武器。玩家们一般将其当作[[批量变形]]对象，或者用于其他[[垃圾]]能派上的用途。

== 历史 ==
橡胶管最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], rubber hoses are removed along with the Keystone Kops, which have been replaced by the [[Keter Sephiroth]].

===SpliceHack===
In [[SpliceHack]], a rubber hose can be combined with a [[club]] at a [[furnace]] to create a [[baseball bat]].

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], all [[Drunk]]s start the game with a +0 rubber hose.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], rubber hoses can be found in junk [[shop]]s.

== 百科文本 ==
吉斯通警察和橡胶管共用同一条[[百科]]文本：
{{encyclopedia|
The Kops are a brilliant concept.  To take a gaggle of inept policemen and display them over and over again in a series of riotously funny physical punishments plays equally well to the peanut gallery and the expensive box seats.  People hate cops.  Even people who have never had anything to do with cops hate them.  Of course, we count on them to keep order and to protect us when we need protecting, and we love them on television shows in which they have nerves of steel and hearts of gold, but in the abstract, as a nation, collectively we hate them.  They are too much like high school principals.  We're very happy to see their pants fall down, and they look good to us with pie on their faces.  The Keystone Kops turn up--and they get punished for it, as they crash into each other, fall down, and suffer indignity after indignity.  Here is pure movie satisfaction.

The Kops are very skillfully presented.  The comic originality and timing in one of their chase scenes requires imagination to think up, talent to execute, understanding of the medium, and, of course, raw courage to perform.  The Kops are madmen presented as incompetents, and they're madmen rushing around in modern machines.  What's more, the machines they were operating in their routines were newly invented and not yet experienced by the average moviegoer.  (In the early days of automobiles, it was reported that there were only two cars registered in all of Kansas City, and they ran into each other.  There is both poetry and philosophy in this fact, but most of all, there is humor.  Sennett got the humor.)
|[ Silent Stars, by Jeanine Basinger ]
}}
